Text.Name: Drink1
Text.Desc: It looked like there was something floating in that water.
Text.StoryDesc: vomitting twice after drinking that water

Text.Name: Dan_Happiness
Text.Desc: I feel happy, relaxed, and don't want to do anything at all.
Text.StoryDesc: feeling difficult to be more content

Text.Name: Eat1
Text.Desc: Can this be eaten? Why must I eat this, it's gross...
Text.StoryDesc: feeling difficult not to feel grossed out after eating this food

Text.Name: Eat3
Text.Desc: What even is this flavor?
Text.StoryDesc: feeling difficult not to feel downcast after eating whatever that was

Text.Name: Eat4
Text.Desc: It's difficult to swallow food that isn't cooked.
Text.StoryDesc: Eating uncooked food leaves one feeling uneasy

Text.Name: Eat5
Text.Desc: I'm entirely too hungry, but all there is dirt... How long could I even live on dirt?
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling depleted after eating that dirt

Text.Name: Eat6
Text.Desc: I'm soooo full after all of that.
Text.StoryDesc: feeling comfortable

Text.Name: Eat7
Text.Desc: This tastes great!
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that the meal was so satisfying

Text.Name: Eat8
Text.Desc: [TXT] tastes divine. I doubt I could be more content.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling happy after a meal like that

Text.Name: Eat9
Text.Desc: [TXT] is this really food made by humans or gods?! I don't even want to seeking Immortality anymore!
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling dazing at how exquisite that meal was

Text.Name: Eat10
Text.Desc: What a crude meal [TXT] was. I don't want to eat this again if I can help it.
Text.StoryDesc: Not feeling satisfied after that meal

Text.Name: Eat11
Text.Desc: That [TXT] today...I've had better and really would prefer something better right about now.
Text.StoryDesc: Not so satisfied with that meal

Text.Name: Eat12
Text.Desc: What sin have I just committed...
Text.StoryDesc: feeling difficult not to feel dazed after eating a pile of #$%^

Text.Name: Sleep1
Text.Desc: I feel full of energy after sleeping.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling energetic after a great night's rest

Text.Name: Sleep2
Text.Desc: I didn't sleep well due to that nightmare.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling tired and weary after a sleep filled with nightmares leaves

Text.Name: Sleep8
Text.Desc: What a great dream...
Text.StoryDesc: feeling difficult not to bask in the glow of such a great dream

Text.Name: Sleep3
Text.Desc: I kept being woken up because it always seemed like there was something moving around nearby.
Text.StoryDesc: feeling difficult not to yawn after such a poor night's sleep

Text.Name: Sleep4
Text.Desc: I kept waking up because of how freezing it was.
Text.StoryDesc: feeling difficult to have a lot of energy after such a poor night's sleep

Text.Name: Sleep5
Text.Desc: It's so hot it's difficult to sleep.
Text.StoryDesc: feeling difficult to have a lot of energy after such a poor night's sleep

Text.Name: Sleep6
Text.Desc: I slept the whole night on the cold, hard ground. My body is aching all over.
Text.StoryDesc: feeling difficult for your body not to be sore after sleeping on the ground

Text.Name: Sleep7
Text.Desc: I couldn't sleep well because I felt like something was stalking me all night long.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling good...other than that all one can do is complain about not wanting to sleep out in the wilderness again

Text.Name: Work
Text.Desc: I could work as a [TXT] all day long.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling satisfied about this job

Text.Name: FavoriteWork
Text.Desc: [TXT] is entirely too interesting. Time flies by while working.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that A job like this could be done all day and one would still come back for more

Text.Name: SocialContact9
Text.Desc: I've been cured by [TXT]. This is fantastic!
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that the healer is great

Text.Name: SocialContact14
Text.Desc: I confessed my love to [TXT] and was rejected.
Text.StoryDesc: feeling hard not to feel down with such recent pain still so fresh

Text.Name: SocialContact15
Text.Desc: [TXT] and I are now a couple, and, WOW, how great life is!
Text.StoryDesc: feeling hard not to feel like a million bucks when you become a partner with someone who also loves you too

Text.Name: Death1
Text.Desc: Death is always such a tragedy.
Text.StoryDesc: feeling difficult not to feel slightly distressed by the passing of another life

Text.Name: Death2
Text.DisplayName: The Death of a Fellow Pupil
Text.Desc: A fellow pupil of my master died...
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that the passing of someone so close leaves those around grieving every time

Text.Name: Death3
Text.Desc: [TXT]... How could you leave? I already miss our time together...
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that tears flow easily when friends pass

Text.Name: Death4
Text.Desc: Why!? Why?! Why take [TXT] from me!?
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that the passing of one's partner makes one question whether life is worth living..

Text.Name: Death5
Text.Desc: My dear [TXT], how many years were you by my side?
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that what memories were shared between a master and a beloved companion?

Text.Name: Death6
Text.Desc: My [TXT] has passed... Now, I'm even more alone...
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that the anguish of losing a loved one is great

Text.Name: Death7
Text.Desc: [TXT] finally kicked the bucket.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that one less enemy makes life easier

Text.Name: Death8
Text.DisplayName: The Death of a Fellow Pupil
Text.Desc: My [TXT] finally left this world...
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that when someone so influential in one's life dies...the pain is great

Text.Name: TaoismPractice1
Text.Desc: My world has just grown bigger!
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that a Breakthrough in training always leaves one elated

Text.Name: TaoismPractice2
Text.Desc: I've had a Breakthrough in training and wow does it feel great!
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that success can breed complacency..

Text.Name: TaoismPractice3
Text.Desc: Regretfully, I failed to perform a Breakthrough...
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that you can't win all that time..

Text.Name: TaoismPractice4
Text.Desc: I feel that my Heavenly Tribulation is drawing near and it's making me uneasy.
Text.StoryDesc: feeling difficult to put one's mind at ease in this type of situation

Text.Name: TaoismPractice5
Text.Desc: I survived!
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Surviving a tribulation really puts a smile on one's face!

Text.Name: TaoismPractice6
Text.Desc: I lost....this was a significant loss...
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Failing a tribulation leaves one completely downtrodden

Text.Name: MakeArt
Text.Desc: I put my heart and soul into this work!
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Finished such a work of art really leaves one feeling satisfied

Text.Name: Health1
Text.Desc: I've been injured and it really hurts...
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that All one can do is grimace in pain

Text.Name: Health2
Text.Desc: I don't feel so good...
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Nobody likes being sick and it's clear just by one look at a sick person

Text.Name: Health3
Text.Desc: I'll never be able to get back what I've lost...
Text.StoryDesc: Becoming disabled changes one's life completely..

Text.Name: SeeSomething1
Text.Desc: I saw a corpse out in the open.
Text.StoryDesc: Seeing a corpse leaves one ill at ease

Text.Name: SeeSomething2
Text.Desc: The sight of blood makes me...uncomfortable.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Blood can leave one at least queasy

Text.Name: NotBury
Text.Desc: We weren't able to bury [TXT] with dignity.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Someone close not being buried properly sets one ill at ease

Text.Name: SayHi
Text.Desc: I greeted [TXT].
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Greeting someone is always better than ignoring them, that's for sure

Text.Name: AfterTalk
Text.Desc: I had a pleasant chat with [TXT].
Text.StoryDesc: feeling always good to catch up

Text.Name: DeepTalk
Text.Desc: I had a heart-to-heart with [TXT].
Text.StoryDesc: feeling always great to have good heart-to-heart talk

Text.Name: Neglect
Text.Desc: I spoke to [TXT], but [IT] didn't seem to want to give me the time of day, so I just returned the favor to [IT].
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Receiving the cold shoulder can leave one...peeved

Text.Name: Quarrel
Text.Desc: I had an argument with [TXT], and I am pissed.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that An argument can really leave both parties hot headed

Text.Name: Insult
Text.Desc: I was humiliated by [TXT].
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Humiliation breeds resentment

Text.Name: SayHiFight
Text.Desc: I was making small talk with [TXT] but for some reason things got all tense, and we started fighting. What a mess.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Sometimes we fight for no reason..

Text.Name: AfterTalkFight
Text.Desc: I had a chat with [TXT] and we ended up fighting for no real reason.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Sometimes we fight for no reason..

Text.Name: DeepTalkFight
Text.Desc: I opened my heart to [TXT] but we entered into a heated argument, and even ended up coming to blows. It's such a shame.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Fighting can easily lead to regret

Text.Name: NeglectFight
Text.Desc: I started talking to [TXT] but they took offence to something I said, and we just ended up fighting each other.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Fighting breeds resentment

Text.Name: QuarrelFight
Text.Desc: I had a quarrel with [TXT] that could only be resolved with fists.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Fighting breeds resentment

Text.Name: InsultFight
Text.Desc: I traded insults with [TXT]. The belligerent idiot had to be taught a lesson, with my fists.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Nothing good ever comes from fighting

Text.Name: Fighting
Text.Desc: I had a fight with [TXT]. [IT] really is such a jerk.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Nothing good ever comes from fighting

Text.Name: BuildBody
Text.Desc: My body's all better now.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Having your body rebuilt after being disabled leaves one elated

Text.Name: FailInLove
Text.Desc: I have fallen head over heels for [TXT].
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that We do dumb things when in love

Text.Name: SleepWithWhat
Text.Desc: I can't sleep with that person.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Poor sleeping arrangements led to anger

Text.Name: StayWithGood
Text.Desc: I like spending time with [TXT].
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that How great it is to bask in the happiness of being able to spend time with a crush

Text.Name: SleepWithSpouse
Text.Desc: I am living together with [TXT].
Text.StoryDesc: feeling easy to be happy when thinking of your significant other

Text.Name: SleepWithLover
Text.Desc: I am living together with [TXT].
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Some feel bashful about their significant others actually accepted them

Text.Name: FoundOrganization1
Text.Desc: We live here, in seclusion, practicing. We have now established a sect. This is a good beginning.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Enthusiasm is contagious with such an auspicious beginning

Text.Name: FoundOrganization2
Text.Desc: Our sect has gradually earned its fame, which is not an easy task. Let's continue building it into a larger sect.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that The sect's ascendancy makes one eager for a fight

Text.Name: FoundOrganization3
Text.Desc: This Heavenly Abode is our Paradise.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Pride abounds when a Sect becomes an Earthly Paradise

Text.Name: BeSchoolMaster
Text.Desc: I will most assuredly lead everyone down the Law to immortality.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Becoming Sect Leader fills one with vigor

Text.Name: INeedTrousersM
Text.Desc: The Sect doesn't even have pants?
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Anger is contagious when there are no pants to be found

Text.Name: INeedClothesF
Text.Desc: AH! Where are my clothes!?
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Shame abounds when one discovers to their surprise that they have naught but a birthday suit on

Text.Name: INeedTrousersF
Text.Desc: AH! Why aren't there any...?!
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Anger is contagious when there are no pants to be found

Text.Name: Kick1
Text.Desc: Someone has been expelled.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Someone getting expelled tends to leave everyone feeling downtrodden

Text.Name: Kick2
Text.Desc: Unfortunately a fellow member has been expelled.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that A fellow member being expelled leaves everyone feeling less than pleased

Text.Name: Kick3
Text.Desc: What are you all doing!? Why is my friend, [TXT], leaving?!
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that A good friend getting expelled tends to leave those that remain at a loss

Text.Name: Kick4
Text.Desc: What are you all doing!? Why is my friend, [TXT], leaving?!
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Anger becomes explosive when a significant other gets expelled

Text.Name: Kick5
Text.Desc: What are you all doing!? Why is my friend, [TXT], leaving?!
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that A family member getting expelled tends to piss one off

Text.Name: Kick6
Text.Desc: My master, [TXT], has been forced out...what went wrong?
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that A master getting expelled tends to piss one off

Text.Name: Kick7
Text.Desc: [TXT] has been kicked out? HAHAHAHA!
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that An enemy getting expelled certainly brightens one's week

Text.Name: Defection1
Text.Desc: Someone has defected from the Sect...
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Why would someone defect?

Text.Name: Defection2
Text.Desc: My [TXT] has defected from the Sect, why...?
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Rage and surprise abound at a family member's defection from the Sect

Text.Name: Defection3
Text.Desc: My [TXT] has defected from the Sect, why...?
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Rage and surprise abound at a friend's defection from the Sect

Text.Name: Defection4
Text.Desc: My [TXT] has defected from the Sect, why...?
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that A lover's defection from the sect is unfathomable

Text.Name: Defection5
Text.Desc: [TXT] ran off? Looks like a hint was finally taken.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that An enemy's defection makes for a great week

Text.Name: DiscontentMood
Text.Desc: I'm not so satisfied with the way things are...
Text.StoryDesc: feeling easy to get upset when one is not satisfied with life

Text.Name: Mood_BasePracticeAchievements1
Text.Desc: It seems like exercising is starting to pay off!
Text.StoryDesc: feeling easy to get excited when gains become noticeable

Text.Name: Mood_BasePracticeAchievements2
Text.Desc: It seems like exercising has really paid off!
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Euphoria abounds when others start taking notice of one's gains

Text.Name: BecomeDisciple
Text.Desc: The road towards Immortality has begun.
Text.StoryDesc: feeling best not to let gains breed complacency

Text.Name: SeeGod
Text.Desc: Witnessing another's ascension is quite the motivation.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Witnessing an ascension can really put one's head on straight

Text.Name: TerribleThing1
Text.Desc: How could he have treated me like that?
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that A terrifying experience leaves one stricken with panic

Text.Name: TerribleThing2
Text.Desc: I witnessed something terrifying happen to [TXT].
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Witnessing a terrifying experience leaves one in a state of apprehension

Text.Name: TerribleThing3
Text.Desc: I'm quite worried after seeing such a terrifying experience happen to my friend, [TXT].
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling fear and anger abound after witnessing something so terrifying happen to a friend

Text.Name: TerribleThing4
Text.Desc: I'm quite worried after seeing such a terrifying experience happen to my friend, [TXT].
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that fear and anger abound after witnessing something so terrifying happen to a lover

Text.Name: TerribleThing5
Text.DisplayName: Feeling Bad for a Family Member
Text.Desc: I witnessed something terrible happen to my [TXT]... How could this happen?
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that fear and anger abound after witnessing something so terrifying happen to a loved one

Text.Name: TerribleThing6
Text.Desc: I witnessed something terrifying.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that witnessing something so terrifying leaves one anxious

Text.Name: NiceThing1
Text.Desc: Someone performed a miracle on me! Incredible!
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that such a wonderful experience leaves one enthralled by the splendor

Text.Name: NiceThing1_1
Text.Desc: I've experienced an unforgettable experience, it was truly fantastic.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that such a wonderful experience leaves one enthralled by it all

Text.Name: NiceThing2
Text.Desc: I witnessed someone perform a miracle on [TXT], I'm so jealous.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that witnessing someone else performed miracle upon breeds jealousy

Text.Name: NiceThing2_1
Text.Desc: I saw someone bring about a miracle, it was magical.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Witnessing a miracle has instilled a sense of yearning

Text.Name: NiceThing3
Text.Desc: I saw someone performed a miracle on my friend, [TXT], and I'm so glad that such a thing happened to such a person.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Witnessing a miracle on a friend has left a keen sense of appreciation

Text.Name: NiceThing4
Text.Desc: I witnessed someone performed a miracle on my significant other, [TXT]. This is spectacular.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Witnessing a miracle on a significant other has left a keen sense of appreciation

Text.Name: NiceThing5
Text.Desc: I witnessed someone performed a miracle on my[TXT] and I am so happy that it happened.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Witnessing a miracle on a family member has left a keen sense of appreciation

Text.Name: Mood_LingStone
Text.Desc: Getting along so swimmingly with Qi is a great feeling.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that A sense of comfort is lent to one enveloped so by such a strong Qi

Text.Name: Mood_LingStone1
Text.Desc: Getting along so swimmingly with Qi is a great feeling.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that A sense of comfort is lent to one enveloped so by such a strong Qi

Text.Name: Mood_Equipment_Fun
Text.Desc: It's not a bad idea to have something on hand to play around with.
Text.StoryDesc: feeling nice to be able to distract oneself when needed

Text.Name: Mood_PracticeFoodScanty
Text.Desc: Stamina is in short supply, there's no way to train.
Text.StoryDesc: Being unable to train due to insufficient stamina. They're vexing, to say the least

Text.Name: SeeBodyPuppet
Text.Desc: I saw something horrifying...and it moved!
Text.StoryDesc: feeling easy to feel horrified after seeing something...supernatural

Text.Name: Illusion1
Text.Desc: Oh, what a wonderful world!
Text.StoryDesc: Seeing wonderful things unbeknownst to others

Text.Name: Illusion2
Text.Desc: Ew, gross!
Text.StoryDesc: Seeing strange things unbeknownst to others

Text.Name: BeResurrection
Text.Desc: I'm resurrected! HAHAHA!
Text.StoryDesc: Still happy about being resurrected

Text.Name: PaoZhang1
Text.Desc: How interesting. They look very pretty.
Text.StoryDesc: Still thinking about the interesting fireworks

Text.Name: PaoZhang2
Text.Desc: Ah! That's disgusting!
Text.StoryDesc: Still feeling sick and grossed out
